name: Star Art: Drawing & Relaxing
description:
Immerse yourself in the relaxing world of geometrical puzzles that turn into stunning art pieces. 

Solving the Star Art puzzles is a comforting and rewarding experience allowing you to create beautiful poly art by connecting each dot with the correct dots around it to form triangles. If you do it right, triangles fill with color. A properly assembled puzzle reveals amazing illustrations, from whimsical animals and flowers to familiar everyday objects. Explore the colorful collection of original images while challenging your attentiveness and logic skills with non-trivial tasks of finding the right connections. Try different methods, develop your own strategy and see if you can solve a level without making any mistakes! 

Key Features:
- Connect the stars into triangles to reveal amazing artwork
- Be guided by the number of remaining connections to each dot
- Mesmerizing color illustrations
- Enhance your logic and creativity
- Great anti-stress activity that promotes relaxation
- New puzzles added regularly

Star Art is a unique game for everyone who likes thinking, beautiful art and having fun!
